mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.zhuhu_danhao_number as zhuhuDanhaoNumber ,a.zhuhu_name as zhuhuName ,a.zhuhu_phone as zhuhuPhone ,a.zhuhu_id_number as zhuhuIdNumber ,a.zhuhu_address as zhuhuAddress ,a.zhuhu_photo as zhuhuPhoto ,a.zhuhu_age as zhuhuAge ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.zhuhu_yimiao_types as zhuhuYimiaoTypes ,a.zhuhu_laiyuandi as zhuhuLaiyuandi ,a.zhuhu_hesuan_types as zhuhuHesuanTypes ,a.zhuhu_xingcheng as zhuhuXingcheng ,a.zhuhu_content as zhuhuContent ,a.zhuhu_types as zhuhuTypes ,a.zhuhu_time as zhuhuTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zhuhu a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.zhuhu_danhao_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuDanhaoNumber},'%')
and a.zhuhu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuName},'%')
and a.zhuhu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuPhone},'%')
and a.zhuhu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuIdNumber},'%')
and a.zhuhu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuAddress},'%')
and a.zhuhu_age >= #{params.zhuhuAgeStart}
and a.zhuhu_age <= #{params.zhuhuAgeEnd}
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.zhuhu_yimiao_types = #{params.zhuhuYimiaoTypes}
and a.zhuhu_laiyuandi like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuLaiyuandi},'%')
and a.zhuhu_hesuan_types = #{params.zhuhuHesuanTypes}
and a.zhuhu_xingcheng like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuXingcheng},'%')
and a.zhuhu_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zhuhuContent},'%')
and a.zhuhu_types = #{params.zhuhuTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhuhu_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhuhuTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.zhuhu_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.zhuhuTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
